Text.val: 06.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
21.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ001 by the BMQ005
06.03.2007 SH SCR12353 Button OK: Added new LCHI fields for update
-- OMQ153 is called 2 times for different MQ types and for every MQ type
separate permissions have to be fetched
... lock LC (active user) not necessary to loock LC if MQ = 154, because only
the message has to be deleted
... in case of MQ = 154 --> delete message
... in case of MQ = 153 --> perform bookings
-- unlock MQDT/LCHD onyl necessary in case of MQ153, in case of MQ154
the related MQ row is already deleted
-- unlock MQDT maybe not necessary because MQ is already deleted,
... unlock LC in case of MQ = 153
... lock not possible because LC is locked by an other user
... only if MQDT row still exists, could be deleted by another user and current
user didn't moved the cursor from parked row
... lock not possible because locked by another user or MQDT is already deleted

ExpSyntax.val: (ISNULL ({0,14}) OR {0,14}='' OR {0,14}=User (0)) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,7},'M')>0
(ISNULL ({0,14}) OR {0,14}='' OR {0,14}=User (0)) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,7},'M')>0

Text.val: @ Bookings for MQ 153 have to be performed in one transaction (also OAD711)
-- If LCHI_AMOUNTRELEASEDRAWING = 0 activate OAD711 to do stock finance
-- If LCHI_AMOUNTRELEASEDRAWING <> 0 or button OK was pressed in OAD711
... write MQ 154 to inform the administration department
... and delete current message from MQ153
-- Prepare variables which uses to update LCHI_MUT*** fields

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(min(LCRD_AMOUNT, LCHI_AMOUNTLC_PRESOLD)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LCHI, :1/LCRD where LCHI_LCHD_NO = :2 and LCHI_TRANSIT = 'N' and LCHI_NO = LCRD_LCHI_NO_RELEASE and LCRD_LCHD_NO = LCHI_LCHD_NO and LCRD_LCHI_NO_DRAWING = :3 for fetch only

select cast(sum(LCRD_AMOUNT - min(LCRD_AMOUNT, LCHI_AMOUNTLC_PRESOLD)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LCHI, :1/LCRD where LCHI_LCHD_NO = :2 and LCHI_TRANSIT = 'N' and LCHI_NO = LCRD_LCHI_NO_RELEASE and LCRD_LCHD_NO = LCHI_LCHD_NO and LCRD_LCHI_NO_DRAWING = :3 for fetch only
